title: I Can
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: What can your early readers do? The children in I Can can hop, jump, ride, and play. Every child can do something. The repeated text patterns, high-frequency words, and familiar verbs in this text give students another accomplishment to add to their list: reading.
reviewWords: climb, crawl, hop, jump, play, ride, run, swing
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
